statements: SELECT * FROM subscriber_data;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number, plan FROM subscriber_data;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT phone_number, plan FROM subscriber_data WHERE subscriber_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan = 'Premium' ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE subscriber_id = 1;
SELECT phone_number, plan FROM subscriber_data WHERE subscriber_id > 100 ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT subscriber_id, plan, billing_information FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan = 'Premium' AND phone_number LIKE '%555%' ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan IN ('Basic', 'Standard') AND length(billing_information) > 100;
SELECT plan, COUNT(*) AS total_subscribers FROM subscriber_data GROUP BY plan HAVING COUNT(*) > 10 ORDER BY total_subscribers DESC;
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan_id = 1
SELECT subscriber_id, plan_id FROM subscriber_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT plan_id, plan_name, plan_details FROM plan_data ORDER BY plan_name DESC
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE billing_info IS NULL
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE subscriber_id = 1
SELECT phone_number, plan_id FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan_id = 3 ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC
SELECT subscriber_id, billing_info FROM subscriber_data WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%'
SELECT * FROM subscriber_data WHERE plan_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY subscriber_id ASC
SELECT s.subscriber_id, p.plan_name FROM subscriber_data s JOIN plan_data p ON s.plan_id = p.plan_id
SELECT * FROM phone_numbers;
SELECT phone_number_id, phone_number FROM phone_numbers ORDER BY phone_number_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT billing_id, phone_number_id, plan_id, billing_date FROM billing_info WHERE amount_due > 100 ORDER BY billing_date DESC;
SELECT phone_number_id, phone_number FROM phone_numbers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM phone_numbers;
SELECT phone_number, phone_number_id FROM phone_numbers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT plan_name, price FROM plans WHERE price > 50;
SELECT billing_id, billing_date, amount_due FROM billing_info WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT p.plan_name, b.amount_due FROM plans p INNER JOIN billing_info b ON p.plan_id = b.plan_id;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number FROM Subscribers WHERE plan_id = 1;
SELECT billing_address, subscriber_id FROM Subscribers ORDER BY subscriber_id DESC;
SELECT plan_name, monthly_price FROM Plans WHERE data_limit >= 10;
SELECT * FROM BillingInfo WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Subscribers;
SELECT subscriber_id, phone_number, plan_id FROM Subscribers WHERE plan_id = 2;
SELECT billing_address, phone_number FROM Subscribers ORDER BY phone_number DESC;
SELECT s.subscriber_id, b.total_amount FROM Subscribers s JOIN BillingInfo b ON s.subscriber_id = b.subscriber_id WHERE b.total_amount > 1000;
SELECT p.*, b.billing_date FROM Payments p JOIN BillingInfo b ON p.billing_id = b.billing_id ORDER BY p.payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers WHERE id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Subscribers WHERE email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT plan_name, description, price FROM Plans WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM Addresses WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT phone_number, created_at FROM PhoneNumbers ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM Subscribers ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Subscribers WHERE phone_number = '+1234567890';
SELECT plan_name, description, price FROM Plans WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT subscriber_id, plan_id, amount_due FROM BillingInformation WHERE payment_status = 'Pending';
SELECT address_line1, address_line2, city, state, postal_code FROM Addresses WHERE subscriber_id = 1001;
